React Chat with & socket.io / PHP

Homework for the subject of web applications done totally in my own way. I have to learn PHP for classes, but the idea of creating a chat with static HTML + PHP seemed absurd to me. That’s how I found the socket.io. For school purposes, I created two branches in the repository, one from socket.io, the other with an excess of silly comments (in polish …) and PHP files. This project taught me how to connect to the API and use the database.
